prompt_inputs.goal: Marathon training with morning 10km run, afternoon 8km tempo run, and evening 5km easy run

solution_criteria: Meal plan covers all three training sessions with appropriate pre/during/post-workout nutrition timing
Total daily carbohydrates are high (minimum 8-10g per kg body weight) to support endurance training
Plan is compact and fits within one day with realistic, practical meals
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a endurance athlete (marathon runner) requiring high carbohydrate intake and specific pre/during/post-workout nutrition timing across morning, afternoon, and evening training sessions
